string-array.item: ðŸŒˆ I want to start this release note with wishing everyone a happy pride month!
ðŸŸ¦ You may notice that square icons have been rounded some more. Over the past month, I have reworked 1400+ icons to make them feel a bit more modern.

ðŸ™‚ Some of you may have noticed the lack of updates. Please keep in mind that I and other contributors are doing this in our free time. That makes it hard to maintain Arcticons with a full-time job. We\'re doing our best to keep it up to date!
